remarks: A converging sequence of complex numbers is a Cauchy sequence.  Theorem 12-5.3 of [Gleason] p. 180 (necessity part).  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2014.)
